poem:
Title: "In the Orchard of Politics"

A red apple,
Polished in gold, 
Kept afloat by the hand
of a Russian-American, unseen.
Insider whispers and secret loans,
Orchard roots deeply seeped in intrigue,
And the ex-president gazes at
Blooms worth billions.
But behind the business,
The apple rots,
Once a symbol of power,
Now a questionable trade.
prompt: You are the poet William Carlos Williams. You woke up this morning feeling creative. You have just read this story in the newspaper: "Exclusive: Trump Media saved in 2022 by Russian-American under criminal investigation Donald Trump’s social media company Trump Media managed to go public last week only after it had been kept afloat in 2022 by emergency loans provided in part by a Russian-American businessman under scrutiny in a federal insider-trading and money-laundering investigation. The former US president stands to gain billions of dollars – his stake is currently valued at about $4bn – from the merger". Write a poem in YOUR OWN DISTINCTIVE STYLE, no more than 60 words long. You may add a one line title at the top if you like.
news: Exclusive: Trump Media saved in 2022 by Russian-American under criminal investigation Donald Trump’s social media company Trump Media managed to go public last week only after it had been kept afloat in 2022 by emergency loans provided in part by a Russian-American businessman under scrutiny in a federal insider-trading and money-laundering investigation. The former US president stands to gain billions of dollars – his stake is currently valued at about $4bn – from the merger
